Text: I love Neverending White Lights. Great Band. From Windsor, Like Me! Check out http://www.neverendingwhitelights.com
P.S the songs without artists listed, like "Always" were sang by Daniel Victor himself.

great music...

btw any way you can upload the act 1? that would be great!!!
I'd love to check out Act 1 -- especially the track "The Grace"... where can I get the whole thing?
I am uploading Act I as we speak.  Tough album to get in the States, I hauled my copy back from a trip to Vancouver.
